about drayton foods llc skip to content our story quality drayton foods llc recognizes the importance of producing a wholesome product for all consumers it is with this in the forefront of our thinking that we aggressively maintain a food safety and quality assurance program which strives to protect all consumers all products produced will be scrutinized to ensure they conform to company legal and governmental standards to the best of our ability in an effort to maintain compliance with the food safety modernization act as well as achieve certification in the global standard for food safety through the british retail consortium brc drayton foods llc has several quality assurance & quality control programs in place that assist in maintaining outstanding audit scores these programs include but are not limited to the following: food safety hazard analysis and critical control points & good manufacturing practices food defense food and drug administrations employee first alert program pre-operational checks & line inspections qa audits of raw and frozen product and processing attributes incoming and outgoing shipping receiving audits defined handling of allergic material program child nurtritional certification program and labeling verification cataloged retention samples our commitment to our customers at drayton foods llc were inspired every day by how our customers use our products for creative solutions in menu planning food design / development and the breakthrough for new concepts in our industry we run our business with the founding principal that if the customer first succeeds the partnership will succeed were committed to our customers and believe our five departments ensure this success sales: our national team of trained sales personnel offer hands on experience with our customers to build a complete understanding of their business and unique needs marketing: our marketing department works to internally develop our customers needs with our own company strenhs research and development: once identified through sales and marketing the goals of our customers become our own and our fully staffed r&d team goes to work on building solutions manufacturing operations and logistics: from purchase order to final delivery our process of managing our customers orders is âhands onâ at all stages with the most innovative technologies being used we strive for nothing less than perfection at all stages of the order process quality assurance: with the fast pace of todays business there is no margin for error our quality assurance department has established itself as an industry leader and continues to train adapt and innovate to stay at the forefront of the ever changing regulations requirements and consumer demands we exist for our customers success which in turn guarantees our success

drayton foods llc cookie notice skip to content cookie notice last revised: january 1 2023 this cookie notice applies to any web page operated by or on behalf of schwanâs company or its subsidiaries collectively âschwanâsâ which may include other interactive properties linked through this and other web pages âschwanâs offeringsâ or âofferingsâ references in this cookie notice to âweâ and through similar words such as âusâ âourâ etc refer to schwanâs as the operator and distributor of the offerings by clicking to accept cookies you are consenting to our use of cookies and similar technologies in accordance with this cookie notice and as further described by following the link to our cookie management page if you do not agree to our use of cookies and similar technologies you can modify your cookies settings or opt out of âsharingâ for cross context advertising as defined by california and similar terms under other states laws for the schwanâs offerings by clicking here although you are not required to accept cookies when you visit the schwanâs offerings please be aware that restricting cookies may impact how the offerings operate for you and you may be unable to use all of the functionality of the offerings if you reject certain cookies the website tools we use or allow are an accepted part of e-commerce and important to your use of the schwanâs offerings like many online platforms schwans and its analytics vendors use server logs and automated data collection tools such as browser cookies pixel tags scripts and web beacons these tools are used for analytics purposes to enable schwans to understand how users interact with the offerings including the sites the information collected by cookies does not explicitly identify you but some information may be considered personal information in certain jurisdictions; it includes but is not limited to general information about your computer settings your connection to the internet eg operating system and platform ip address your browsing patterns and timings of browsing on the website and your location schwans and its analytics vendors may also tie the information gathered by the website tools to the identity of users location data may be collected through targeting cookies and is typically used for purposes such as providing targeted advertisements that are relevant to your geographical location but will not provide precise location information further details about the types of cookies that schwanâs utilizes can be found below any personal information you do provide to us through the offerings would be governed by schwanâs privacy notice i what is a cookie cookies and similar technologies like pixels web beacons etc are pieces of data issued by a website that among other things allow your computer to utilize all the features on the website if and when your computer accepts a cookie the cookie may be stored on the computerâs hard drive below we provide more information about the specific types of cookies utilized by the schwanâs offerings and what those cookies do ii what data is collected by cookies each time a computer visits the schwanâs offerings we may collect certain data from that computer this data is automatically collected from the computerâs web browser and may include data such as the following: the type of web browser software the computer uses for example google chrome or internet explorer; the name of the domain from which the computer accessed the internet; the internet address of the website from which the computer linked directly to the schwanâs offering; the date and time the computer accessed the offering we may use this data to help us make the schwanâs offerings more useful to you and for other business purposes for example we may tell business partners how many computers visited the offerings or what pages were most popular we may prepare reports and other materials using the data we may use this data for any other purposes as described herein and may share the data with third parties iii what kind of cookies do the schwanâs offerings use session cookies are used to identify a particular visit to schwans offerings and collect information about your interaction with those offerings these cookies expire after a short time or when the user closes their web browser after using the sites schwans uses these cookies to identify a user during a single browsing session this helps schwans improve the offerings including the sites as well as improve the users browsing experience a persistent cookie will remain on a users device for a set period of time specified in the cookie or until you manually delete your cookies via your browser these cookies do not expire when you close your browser by assigning your computer a unique identifier through a persistent cookie we are able to create a database of your previous choices and preferences which can be provided by us automatically saving you time and effort on future visits in addition schwans may use tracking technology to determine if a certain page was visited or whether an email sent by schwans was opened or clicked on by a user and to customize the experience of individual users by recommending specific content 1 strictly necessary cookies strictly necessary cookies enable basic functions on the schwanâs offerings like page navigation and access to secure areas of the offerings the schwanâs offerings cannot function properly without these cookies as such necessary cookies will always be collected regardless of your cookie settings necessary cookies are used for the following purposes including: preserving your website session state across page requests; distributing traffic to the schwanâs offerings across several servers in order to optimize response times and improve your website experience; identifying trusted web traffic to keep the schwanâs offerings secure; storing your cookie consent state for the current schwanâs offerings youâre visiting 2 functional/preference cookies functional also referred to as preference cookies which are a type of persistent cookie enable the schwanâs offerings to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks during your experience like your preferred language the font text appears in or the region that youâre located in preference cookies are used to establish a unique user id that recognizes you on returning visits in order to improve and personalize your website experience for example schwanâs uses preference cookies in the following ways: provide a more personalized experience to users with more relevant content and content recommendations; allow users to more easily log in to use the offerings; remember information about a users browser and settings preferences such as preferred language to make the experience more functional and customized; make the experience of using the offerings better like remembering the sound volume level selected by the user; test different versions of the offerings to see which particular features or content users prefer to optimize the sites; and authentication and security cookies to enable you to log in or stay logged in to access the sites protect user accounts against fraudulent log-ins by others and help detect and protect against abuse or unauthorized usage of user accounts 3 performance/statistics cookies performance also referred to as âstatisticsâ cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the schwanâs offerings by collecting and reporting information anonymously statistics cookies are used for the following purposes: anonymously logging details about your browser and computer through a website like google analytics; collecting anonymous data on your visits to the schwanâs offerings such as the number of visits average time spent on the website and what pages have been loaded in order to generate reports for optimizing the schwanâs offerings content; determining what type of device smartphones tablets computers tvs etc is being used to access the schwanâs offerings; and gathering anonymous technical information regarding your browser operating system ip address and screen resolution as well as your navigation on the website 4 targeting/advertising cookies targeting also referred to as âadvertisingâ or âmarketingâ cookies are used to track visitors across the schwanâs offerings and possibly other websites the intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for each individual user of the schwanâs offerings you may opt out of the collection of marketing cookies at any time marketing cookies are used for the following purposes: registering a unique id that identifies your device for the purpose of targeted ads auto-populating forms validating if certain contact information is correct keeping statistics about third party sites used/accessed through the schwanâs offerings; registering anonymized user data such as ip address geographical location visited websites and what ads you have clicked with the purpose of optimizing ad display based on your movement on websites that use the same ad network; collecting data on your visits to the website such as what pages have been accessed number of visits average time spent on the website in order to categorize your interest and demographic profiles in terms of resales for targeted marketing identifying traffic patterns on the schwanâs offerings and carrying out surveys to better understand your preferences; evaluating efficacy of advertisements and likelihood of groups to engage with the schwanâs offerings and purchase schwanâs products or services; and registering your sharing of content via social media iv do third parties get my cookie information schwanâs may use service providers to provide site metrics and other analytics services for example: reviewing and analyzing user browser and wireless device technical information; reviewing user activity across sites for example schwans analyzes trends user traffic and usage information to determine the performance of content research reports or events; measuring tracking and analyzing trends and usage in connection with your use or the performance of our offerings; and determining the popularity of certain content and to better understand how you use our sites we and/or such third parties also may use these technologies to collect information about your online activities over time and across third-party websites or other online services behavioral tracking additionally our sites may include social media features such as the facebook like button our integration of these features may allow third-party social media to collect certain information such as your ip address and which pages you are visiting when using our sites and to set a cookie to enable that feature to function properly your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policy of the company providing such features the service providers that we engage are bound by confidentiality obligations and other restrictions with respect to their use and collection of your information v third party ad networks schwanâs may use third parties such as network advertisers to serve advertisements on third party websites or other media for example a third-party social networking website this enables schwanâs and these third parties to target advertisements on those third-party websites to you for products offered by us and products and websites offered by third parties in which you might be interested third party ad network providers advertisers sponsors and/or traffic measurement websites may use cookies javascript web beacons flash cookies or local shared objects and other tracking technologies to measure the effectiveness of their ads and to personalize advertising content to you this cookie notice does not apply to those third parties and we cannot control their activities you should consult the respective privacy or cookie policies of these third-party ad servers or ad networks for more information on their practices and for instructions on how to opt-out of certain practices for example you may go to the digital advertising alliance âdaaâ consumer choice page for information about opting out of interest-based advertising and choices regarding having information used by daa companies you may also go to the network advertising initiative ânaiâ consumer opt-out pagefor information about opting out of interest-based advertising and choices regarding having information used by third party companies who are nai members opting out from one or more companies listed on the daa consumer choice page or the nai consumer opt-out page will remove you from those companiesâ delivery of interest-based content or ads to you but it does not mean you will no longer receive any advertising through the schwanâs offerings or on other third party websites even if you opt-out from one or more companies listed on the daa consumer choice page or the nai consumer opt-out page you may continue to receive advertisements for example based on the particular website that you are viewing ie contextually based ads also if your browsers are configured to reject cookies when you opt-out on the daa or nai websites your opt-out action may not be effective additional information is available on the daaâs website atwwwaboutadsinfo or the naiâs website contact drayton foods llc skip to content contact us wed love to hear from you if you have questions or comments send us a note with our easy form if you would like to talk to someone you can call us at 701-277-9947 monday â friday 8am â 5pm central time what is your question or comment regarding please choose an option love your product locate a product all other thank you for your interest in drayton foods llc unfortunately we are unable to give coupons out upon request first name: last name: address 1: address 2: state: select state al ak az ar ca co ct de dc fl ga hi id il in ia ks ky la me md ma mi mn ms mo mt ne nv nh nj nm ny nc nd oh ok or pa ri sc sd tn tx ut vt va wa wv wi wy city: zip code: email address: upc code: where is the upc code help locating the upc code can be found on the side of the package it is what the store scans product identification code / proof of purchase where is the product identification code help locating the product identification code / proof of purchase is a 10–digit number that can be found just below the best buy date on the side of the box product name: which stores did you shop at for this product comments: using 500 characters or less please share your comments acceptable characters include letters numbers and special characters: ; = \ : using other characters may cause the form to error phone number: format: xxx-xxx-xxxx sweepstakes social media website unknown source: submit denotes required field
or as we believe is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law
column4: legal process or governmental request. In some circumstances we may anonymize your personal information (so that it can no longer be associated with you) for research or statistical purposes
column5: in which case we may use this information indefinitely without further notice to you. IX. MARKETING AND PROMOTIONAL COMMUNICATIONS You may unsubscribe from receiving marketing and promotional messages from Schwan's
column6: if those messages are powered by Schwan's
column7: by following the instructions in those messages. If you decide to unsubscribe
column8: you will still receive non-promotional communications relevant to your use of our Offerings. X. CHILDREN'S ONLINE PRIVACY PROTECTION ACT (COPPA) COMPLIANCE AND RELATED INFORMATION None of our sites are intended for children under 16 years of age. It is our policy to refrain from knowingly collecting or maintaining personal information relating to any person under the age of 16. If you are under the age of 16
column9: please do not supply any personal information through the sites. If you are under the age of 16 and have already provided personal information through the sites
column10: please have your parent or guardian contact us immediately using the information provided under CONTACT INFORMATION so that we can remove such information from our files. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 16
column11: please contact us at CONTACT INFORMATION. XI. SECURITY We take reasonable measures
column15: to protect your information from loss
column21: and destruction. That said the security of personal data transmitted through the internet or via a mobile device can never be guaranteed. We are not responsible for any interception or interruption of any communications through the internet or for changes to or losses of data. We hold information about you both at our own premises and with the assistance of third-party service providers. Further public disclosure here of our security measures could aid those who might attempt to circumvent those security measures. If you are utilizing a web-based login through any Offerings
column22: you are responsible for maintaining the security of any password
column24: or other form of authentication involved in obtaining access to password protected or secure areas of the Offerings. In order to protect you and your information
column25: we may suspend your account and use of any of the Offerings
column28: if any breach of security is suspected. XII. YOUR STATE PRIVACY RIGHTS AND ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS Depending on the state in which you reside

Data: DRAYTON FOODS LLC Cookie Notice Skip to content Our Products ▾ ▴ Self-Rising Pizza Crusts Sheeted Pizza Crusts Dough Balls & Dough Pucks Breadsticks Dinner Rolls Employment Our Story Cookie Notice Last Revised: January 1, 2023 This Cookie Notice applies to any web page operated by or on behalf of Schwanâs Company or its subsidiaries (collectively, âSchwanâsâ), which may include other interactive properties linked through this and other web pages (âSchwanâs Offering(s)â or âOffering(s)â). References in this Cookie Notice to âweâ and through similar words such as âus,â âour,â etc. refer to Schwanâs as the operator and distributor of the Offerings. By clicking to accept cookies, you are consenting to our use of cookies and similar technologies in accordance with this Cookie Notice and as further described by following the link to our Cookie Management Page. If you do not agree to our use of cookies and similar technologies, you can modify your cookies settings or opt out of âsharingâ for cross context advertising, as defined by California and similar terms under other states laws, for the Schwanâs Offerings by clicking here. Although you are not required to accept cookies when you visit the Schwanâs Offerings, please be aware that restricting cookies may impact how the Offerings operate for you, and you may be unable to use all of the functionality of the Offerings if you reject certain cookies. The website tools we use or allow are an accepted part of e-commerce and important to your use of the Schwanâs Offerings. Like many online platforms, Schwan's and its analytics vendors use server logs and automated data collection tools, such as browser cookies, pixel tags, scripts and web beacons. These tools are used for analytics purposes to enable Schwan's to understand how users interact with the Offerings, including the sites. The information collected by cookies does not explicitly identify you, but some information may be considered personal information in certain jurisdictions; it includes, but is not limited to, general information about your computer settings, your connection to the Internet (e.g. operating system and platform, IP address, your browsing patterns, and timings of browsing on the website), and your location. Schwan's and its analytics vendors may also tie the information gathered by the website tools to the identity of users. Location data may be collected through targeting cookies and is typically used for purposes such as providing targeted advertisements that are relevant to your geographical location but will not provide precise location information. Further details about the types of cookies that Schwanâs utilizes can be found below. Any personal information you do provide to us through the Offerings would be governed by Schwanâs Privacy Notice. I. WHAT IS A COOKIE? Cookies (and similar technologies like pixels, web beacons, etc.) are pieces of data issued by a website that, among other things, allow your computer to utilize all the features on the website. If and when your computer accepts a cookie, the cookie may be stored on the computerâs hard drive. Below we provide more information about the specific types of cookies utilized by the Schwanâs Offerings, and what those cookies do. II. WHAT DATA IS COLLECTED BY COOKIES? Each time a computer visits the Schwanâs Offerings we may collect certain data from that computer. This data is automatically collected from the computerâs web browser and may include data such as the following: the type of web browser software the computer uses (for example, Google Chrome or Internet Explorer); the name of the domain from which the computer accessed the Internet; the Internet address of the website from which the computer linked directly to the Schwanâs Offering; the date and time the computer accessed the Offering. We may use this data to help us make the Schwanâs Offerings more useful to you and for other business purposes. For example, we may tell business partners how many computers visited the Offerings or what pages were most popular. We may prepare reports and other materials using the data. We may use this data for any other purposes as described herein and may share the data with third parties. III. WHAT KIND OF COOKIES DO THE SCHWANâS OFFERINGS USE? Session cookies are used to identify a particular visit to Schwan's Offerings and collect information about your interaction with those Offerings. These cookies expire after a short time or when the user closes their web browser after using the sites. Schwan's uses these cookies to identify a user during a single browsing session. This helps Schwan's improve the Offerings, including the sites, as well as improve the users' browsing experience. A persistent cookie will remain on a user's device for a set period of time specified in the cookie or until you manually delete your cookies via your browser. These cookies do not expire when you close your browser. By assigning your computer a unique identifier through a persistent cookie, we are able to create a database of your previous choices and preferences which can be provided by us automatically, saving you time and effort on future visits. In addition, Schwan's may use tracking technology to determine if a certain page was visited or whether an email sent by Schwan's was opened or clicked on by a user and to customize the experience of individual users by recommending specific content. 1. Strictly Necessary Cookies Strictly necessary cookies enable basic functions on the Schwanâs Offerings, like page navigation and access to secure areas of the Offerings. The Schwanâs Offerings cannot function properly without these cookies. As such, necessary cookies will always be collected regardless of your cookie settings. Necessary cookies are used for the following purposes, including: Preserving your website session state across page requests; Distributing traffic to the Schwanâs Offerings across several servers in order to optimize response times and improve your website experience; Identifying trusted web traffic to keep the Schwanâs Offerings secure; Storing your cookie consent state for the current Schwanâs Offerings youâre visiting. 2. Functional/Preference Cookies Functional (also referred to as Preference) cookies, which are a type of persistent cookie, enable the Schwanâs Offerings to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks during your experience, like your preferred language, the font text appears in, or the region that youâre located in. Preference cookies are used to establish a unique user ID that recognizes you on returning visits in order to improve and personalize your website experience. For example, Schwanâs uses preference cookies in the following ways: provide a more personalized experience to users with more relevant content and content recommendations; allow users to more easily log in to use the Offerings; remember information about a user's browser and settings preferences, such as preferred language, to make the experience more functional and customized; make the experience of using the Offerings better, like remembering the sound volume level selected by the user; test different versions of the Offerings to see which particular features or content users prefer to optimize the sites; and authentication and security cookies to enable you to log in or stay logged in to access the sites, protect user accounts against fraudulent log-ins by others, and help detect and protect against abuse or unauthorized usage of user accounts. 3. Performance/Statistics Cookies Performance (also referred to as âStatisticsâ) cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the Schwanâs Offerings by collecting and reporting information anonymously. Statistics cookies are used for the following purposes: Anonymously logging details about your browser and computer through a website like Google Analytics; Collecting anonymous data on your visits to the Schwanâs Offerings, such as the number of visits, average time spent on the website and what pages have been loaded, in order to generate reports for optimizing the Schwanâs Offerings content; Determining what type of device (smartphones, tablets, computers, TVs etc.) is being used to access the Schwanâs Offerings; and Gathering anonymous, technical information regarding your browser, operating system, IP address and screen resolution as well as your navigation on the website. 4. Targeting/Advertising Cookies Targeting (also referred to as âAdvertisingâ or âMarketingâ) cookies are used to track visitors across the Schwanâs Offerings and possibly other websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for each individual user of the Schwanâs Offerings. You may opt out of the collection of marketing cookies at any time. Marketing cookies are used for the following purposes: Registering a unique ID that identifies your device for the purpose of targeted ads, auto-populating forms, validating if certain contact information is correct, keeping statistics about third party sites used/accessed through the Schwanâs Offerings; Registering anonymized user data, such as IP address, geographical location, visited websites, and what ads you have clicked, with the purpose of optimizing ad display based on your movement on websites that use the same ad network; Collecting data on your visits to the website, such as what pages have been accessed, number of visits, average time spent on the website, in order to categorize your interest and demographic profiles in terms of resales for targeted marketing, identifying traffic patterns on the Schwanâs Offerings, and carrying out surveys to better understand your preferences; Evaluating efficacy of advertisements and likelihood of groups to engage with the Schwanâs Offerings and purchase Schwanâs products or services; and Registering your sharing of content via social media. IV. DO THIRD PARTIES GET MY COOKIE INFORMATION? Schwanâs may use Service Providers to provide site metrics and other analytics services, for example: Reviewing and analyzing user browser and wireless device technical information; Reviewing user activity across site(s) (for example, Schwan's analyzes trends, user traffic and usage information to determine the performance of content, research reports, or events); Measuring, tracking and analyzing trends and usage in connection with your use or the performance of our Offerings; and Determining the popularity of certain content, and to better understand how you use our sites. We and/or such third parties also may use these technologies to collect information about your online activities over time and across third-party websites or other online services (behavioral tracking). Additionally, our sites may include social media features, such as the Facebook Like button. Our integration of these features may allow third-party social media to collect certain information, such as your IP address and which page(s) you are visiting when using our sites, and to set a cookie to enable that feature to function properly. Your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policy of the company providing such features. The Service Providers that we engage are bound by confidentiality obligations and other restrictions with respect to their use and collection of your information. V. THIRD PARTY AD NETWORKS Schwanâs may use third parties, such as network advertisers, to serve advertisements on third party websites or other media (for example, a third-party social networking website). This enables Schwanâs and these third parties to target advertisements on those third-party websites to you for products offered by us and products and websites offered by third parties in which you might be interested. Third party ad network providers, advertisers, sponsors, and/or traffic measurement websites may use cookies, JavaScript, Web beacons, flash cookies, or local shared objects and other tracking technologies to measure the effectiveness of their ads and to personalize advertising content to you. This Cookie Notice does not apply to those third parties, and we cannot control their activities. You should consult the respective privacy or cookie policies of these third-party ad servers or ad networks for more information on their practices and for instructions on how to opt-out of certain practices. For example, you may go to the Digital Advertising Alliance (âDAAâ) Consumer Choice Page for information about opting out of interest-based advertising and choices regarding having information used by DAA companies. You may also go to the Network Advertising Initiative (âNAIâ) Consumer Opt-Out Pagefor information about opting out of interest-based advertising and choices regarding having information used by third party companies who are NAI members. Opting out from one or more companies listed on the DAA Consumer Choice Page or the NAI Consumer Opt-Out Page will remove you from those companiesâ delivery of interest-based content or ads to you, but it does not mean you will no longer receive any advertising through the Schwanâs Offerings or on other third party websites. Even if you opt-out from one or more companies listed on the DAA Consumer Choice Page or the NAI Consumer Opt-Out Page, you may continue to receive advertisements, for example, based on the particular website that you are viewing (i.e., contextually based ads). Also, if your browsers are configured to reject cookies when you opt-out on the DAA or NAI websites, your opt-out action may not be effective. Additional information is available on the DAAâs website atwww.aboutads.info or the NAIâs website at https://www.networkadvertising.org/.
